wikipedia_page.main: Nicola Lavery (born 19 November 1960) is a British cross-country skier. She competed in four events at the 1984 Winter Olympics.She is also a fell runner, having completed a winter Bob Graham Round and won the Wasdale, Ennerdale and Three Shires races.
